title: Dark elven dagger (SLASH'EM)
data:
- - *For the weapon in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), see [droven dagger](/wiki/Droven_dagger "Droven dagger").*
  - *For the weapon in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), see [dark elven dagger (EvilHack)](/wiki/Dark_elven_dagger_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven dagger (EvilHack)").*

| ) [![Dark elven dagger.png](/images/5/56/Dark_elven_dagger.png)](/wiki/File:Dark_elven_dagger.png) |                                                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| Name                                                                                               | dark elven dagger                                      |
| Appearance                                                                                         | black runed dagger                                     |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                   | 1d5                                                    |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                   | 1d3                                                    |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                       | +2                                                     |
| Weapon skill                                                                                       | [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger")                        |
| Size                                                                                               | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")            |
| Base price                                                                                         | 4 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                             | [10](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                            |
| Material                                                                                           | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                              |

A **dark elven dagger** is a type of [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is a [stackable](/wiki/Stackable "Stackable") one-handed weapon that can be used in melee and thrown, and uses the [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"). It is made of [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood"), and appears as a **black runed dagger** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

  - [1.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [1.2 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [1.3 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [2 Description](#Description)

- [3 References](#References)

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven dagger. Drow [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") and [Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue") start with dark elven daggers in place of their role's standard daggers.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

### SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, dark elven daggers are not randomly generated. [Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a [great dagger](/wiki/Great_dagger "Great dagger") has a 1⁄2 chance of producing a dark elven dagger.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

### SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, dark elven daggers are not randomly generated.

### SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, dark elven daggers can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general [stores](/wiki/Store "Store"), used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven daggers. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

## Description

The dark elven dagger is nearly identical to the [elven dagger](/wiki/Elven_dagger "Elven dagger") minus its appearance, with the same damage and [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus.

Upgrading a dark elven dagger will produce a great dagger.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 356](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c#line356 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c")
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2199](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/potion.c#line2199 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/potion.c")
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2205](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/potion.c#line2205 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/potion.c")

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_elven_dagger_\(SLASH%27EM\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Dark elven dagger (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the weapon in dNetHack and notdNetHack, see droven dagger.
For the weapon in EvilHack, see dark elven dagger (EvilHack).
)
Name dark elven dagger
Appearance black runed dagger
Damage vs. small 1d5
Damage vs. large 1d3
To-hit bonus +2
Weapon skill dagger
Size one-handed
Base price 4 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 10
Material wood

A dark elven dagger is a type of weapon that appears in SLASH'EM, SpliceHack and SlashTHEM. It is a stackable one-handed weapon that can be used in melee and thrown, and uses the dagger skill. It is made of wood, and appears as a black runed dagger when unidentified.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
    • 1.1 SLASH'EM
    • 1.2 SpliceHack
    • 1.3 SlashTHEM
  • 2 Description
  • 3 References

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven dagger. Drow Rangers and Rogues start with dark elven daggers in place of their role's standard daggers.[1]

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, dark elven daggers are not randomly generated. Upgrading a great dagger has a 1⁄2 chance of producing a dark elven dagger.[2]

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, dark elven daggers are not randomly generated.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, dark elven daggers can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general stores, used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven daggers. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

Description

The dark elven dagger is nearly identical to the elven dagger minus its appearance, with the same damage and to-hit bonus.

Upgrading a dark elven dagger will produce a great dagger.[3]

References

  1. ↑ makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 356
  2. ↑ potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2199
  3. ↑ potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2205
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''dark elven dagger''' is a type of [[weapon]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SpliceHack]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. It is a [[stackable]] one-handed weapon that can be used in melee and thrown, and uses the [[dagger]] [[skill]]. It is made of [[wood]], and appears as a '''black runed dagger''' when [[identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven dagger. Drow [[Ranger]]s and [[Rogue]]s start with dark elven daggers in place of their role's standard daggers.{{refsrc|makemon.c|356|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===SLASH'EM===
In SLASH'EM, dark elven daggers are not randomly generated. [[Upgrading]] a [[great dagger]] has a {{frac|2}} chance of producing a dark elven dagger.{{refsrc|potion.c|2199|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===SpliceHack===
In SpliceHack, dark elven daggers are not randomly generated.

===SlashTHEM===
In SlashTHEM, dark elven daggers can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general [[store]]s, used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven daggers. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

==Description==
The dark elven dagger is nearly identical to the [[elven dagger]] minus its appearance, with the same damage and [[to-hit]] bonus.

Upgrading a dark elven dagger will produce a great dagger.{{refsrc|potion.c|2205|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}
